title: Price drop: Transfer and sync all kinds of files among your Apple devices
description: AnyTrans is a one-stop content manager for iOS devices. The app makes it easy to transfer any kind of data -- music, photos, texts, etc. (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: Cult of Mac Deals
excerpt: AnyTrans is a one-stop content manager for iOS devices. The app makes it easy to transfer any kind of data -- music, photos, texts, etc.
text: Deals Sidestep Apple's file-management hurdles with AnyTrans. Photo: Cult of Mac Deals AnyTrans is a one-stop content manager for iOS devices. The Mac app makes it easy to transfer any kind of data — music, photos, texts, whatever — among all your Apple gear. And for a limited time, you can get a lifetime subscription to AnyTrans for just $19.97 with code LIFETIME10 (regularly $79.99). AnyTrans: Your one-stop shop for managing iOS data iMobie’s AnyTrans app sets users up with an all-in-one content manager that can be used on iPhone, iPad, iPod and Mac. It’s designed to help users transfer, manage and back up iOS data quickly and easily, whether that’s your music files, iMessages, photos, books or Safari history. It’s a convenient and valuable system for any Apple user to consider adopting. Plus, users can enjoy one-click transfers from their old iPhone or Android device. That means you can move messages, photos, contacts and call logs to new iPhones easily. Additionally, AnyTrans supports WhatsApp message transfers from old devices, iPhone backups so you never lose important pictures or messages, and one-click transfers of non-purchased music from older devices. A highly rated content manager for Apple gear If you’re on the fence about AnyTrans, it’s worth looking at the reviews. TechRadar raved, “AnyTrans allows for greater flexibility when it comes to two-way file synchronization and far better phone management options.” Get a lifetime subscription to AnyTrans, the one-stop content manager for iOS, for just $19.97 with code LIFETIME10. Price drop ends at 11: 59 p.m. Pacific on April 27, 2025. Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackCommerce, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackCommerce directly. We originally published this post on AnyTrans on October 24, 2023. We updated the information.
html:
• Deals

AnyTrans is a one-stop content manager for iOS devices. The Mac app makes it easy to transfer any kind of data — music, photos, texts, whatever — among all your Apple gear.

And for a limited time, you can get a lifetime subscription to AnyTrans for just $19.97 with code LIFETIME10 (regularly $79.99).

AnyTrans: Your one-stop shop for managing iOS data

iMobie’s AnyTrans app sets users up with an all-in-one content manager that can be used on iPhone, iPad, iPod and Mac. It’s designed to help users transfer, manage and back up iOS data quickly and easily, whether that’s your music files, iMessages, photos, books or Safari history. It’s a convenient and valuable system for any Apple user to consider adopting.

Plus, users can enjoy one-click transfers from their old iPhone or Android device. That means you can move messages, photos, contacts and call logs to new iPhones easily. Additionally, AnyTrans supports WhatsApp message transfers from old devices, iPhone backups so you never lose important pictures or messages, and one-click transfers of non-purchased music from older devices.

A highly rated content manager for Apple gear

If you’re on the fence about AnyTrans, it’s worth looking at the reviews. TechRadar raved, “AnyTrans allows for greater flexibility when it comes to two-way file synchronization and far better phone management options.”

Get a lifetime subscription to AnyTrans, the one-stop content manager for iOS, for just $19.97 with code LIFETIME10. Price drop ends at 11: 59 p.m. Pacific on April 27, 2025.

Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals

Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackCommerce, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackCommerce directly. We originally published this post on AnyTrans on October 24, 2023. We updated the information.
